item.title: 2025-09-09 - FAQ 1-3KZ156 - GLRLETR log file has error "$LOG ambiguous redirect" when run from Applications Manager
item.description: This article is for clients using the older scripted Banner Integration AW_BANNER.  It does NOT apply to the Banner Agent Running GLRLETR from Appworx can give this error: * BANNERLOG STARTS HERE **** /u01/ban7/links/glrletr.shl: line 31: $LOG: ambiguous redirect /u01/ban7/links/glrletr.shl: line 42: $LOG: ambiguous redirect This can happen if the GLRLETR module is defined with BANNERSHL as the Program Type. With this program type, the environment variable $LOG is not being set . Workaround is to change the program type to BANNERSH: Verify that Program Type BANNERSH exists (if BANNERSH exists, skip to Step 2).  If it doesn't, then create it: a. Go to Object Admin/Development/Program Types b. Highlight the existing BANNERSHL, then choose Copy. c. Change the Name field from "BANNERSHL" to "BANNERSH". Don't change any other values. Click OK. Edit the GLRLETR module - On the General tab, change the program type from BANNERSHL to BANNERSH Test GLRLETR By changing the program type, it will go through a different part of the AW_BANNER script which will define the $LOG value and the job should run. Related FAQ: 1-4Z54CG: AppWorx - GLRLETR.lis file is going to the $AW_HOME/out directory instead of the job submission directory
item.guid: Finacial Aid Tech Notes/2025-09-09 - FAQ 1-3KZ156 - GLRLETR log file has error "$LOG ambiguous redirect" when run from Applications Manager.md

item.title: 2025-09-09 - RSRENRL - What to do if RSRENRL is run after lock hours at drop-add
item.description: the hours set by the final run of rsrenrl on 12:01 am the day after drop add Get the rsrenrl lis file from Appworx In Appworx, open an explorer window Select Filter -> History Query Search for the RSRENRL Job Find the RSRENR job that ran on 12:01 the day after drop add Under "Output Files", open the rsrenrl*.lis file Save that file Convert the rsrenrl.lis file to an Excel document Open the rsrenrl.lis file in Visual Studio Code (or other text editor) Remove all the non-data lines using grep Remove all the data lines that don't have 'REPEAT' or 'STANDARD' in the 'Rule/Attend Date' column using grep. Create a new spreadsheet in Exel Use power query to import the edited rsrenrl.lis file the hours set by rsrenrl when run after lock hours run Run the following SQL script. Set the date in the TO_DATE function parameters to the time rsrenrl finished after being run at 12:01 am the day after drop add You can find this time in the Appworx log for RSRENRL Import this data into a new sheet in the excel document you created above students whose enrollment hours changed between those two runs See 'Fix RSRENRL 2025-08-26 - V2' for how to do this For students whose hours changed between the the two runs of rsrenrl, set their REPEAT and STANDARD credit hours, billing hours, and adjusted hours at the top of ROAENRL to the values that were set at the rsrenrl run on 12:01 am the day after drop add Create a manual popsel of the population of students whose hours changed Upload Banner IDs to banner using SZPCPOP Verify that the Banner IDs loaded correctly, browse popsel created by SZPCPOP in GLAEXTR Run rpepellj on this population to recalculate pell based on the corrected number of hours Run sql script to create report of discrepancies between offered and paid amount for pell awards In WHERE clause, look for rpratrm_activity_date >= the date/time that rpepellj completed when you ran it above. Send this report to LeeAnn Barnes for review SELECT RPRATRM_FUND_CODE, RPRATRM_PERIOD, RPRATRM_OFFER_AMT, RPRATRM_OFFER_DATE, RPRATRM_ACTIVITY_DATE, RPRATRM_ORIG_OFFER_AMT, RPRATRM_ORIG_OFFER_DATE, RPRATRM_ACCEPT_AMT, RPRATRM_ACCEPT_DATE, RPRATRM_PAID_AMT, RPRATRM_PAID_DATE, SPRIDEN_ID, SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME, SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME, SPRIDEN_MI FROM rpratrm JOIN spriden ON spriden_pidm = rpratrm_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL WHERE rpratrm_activity_date >= TO_DATE('2025-08-27 12:50:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AND rpratrm_fund_code = '80001' AND rpratrm_period = Create a manual popsel of students whose hours changed and who have NC Next awards Run SQL Script on the list of banner IDs to identify the students with a state grant award SELECT * FROM rpratrm JOIN spriden ON spriden_pidm = rpratrm_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL WHERE rpratrm_period = '202540' AND rpratrm_fund_code = 80039 AND spriden_id IN (list of banner ids of all students with changed enrollment hrs) Upload list of IDs to Banner using SZPCPOP to create a manual popsel run rzpncaw on these students Send the output of rzpncaw to Jonathan Ibarra for review. Run rpedisbj on the population of all students whose enrollment hours changed to adjust all other awards based on the corrected number of hours. Run the following SQL script to generate a report of all students whose awards changed after running rpedisbj In WHERE clause, look for rpratrm_activity_date >= the date/time that rpedisbj completed. Share this report with the admin team for review SELECT RPRATRM_FUND_CODE, RPRATRM_PERIOD, RPRATRM_OFFER_AMT, RPRATRM_OFFER_DATE, RPRATRM_ACTIVITY_DATE, RPRATRM_ORIG_OFFER_AMT, RPRATRM_ORIG_OFFER_DATE, RPRATRM_ACCEPT_AMT, RPRATRM_ACCEPT_DATE, RPRATRM_PAID_AMT, RPRATRM_PAID_DATE, RPRATRM_USER_ID, SPRIDEN_ID, SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME, SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME, SPRIDEN_MI FROM rpratrm JOIN spriden ON spriden_pidm = rpratrm_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL WHERE rpratrm_activity_date >= TO_DATE('2025-08-27 12:50:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AND rpratrm_period = '202540' AND spriden_id IN (list of banner ids of all students with changed enrollment hrs)
item.guid: Finacial Aid Tech Notes/2025-09-09 - RSRENRL - What to do if RSRENRL is run after lock hours at drop-add.md
